question: India SME Services Platform' is a digital initiative of which financial institution of India?
option1: Small Industries Development Bank of India (SIDBI)
option2: National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development (NABARD)
option4: Export and Import Bank of India (EXIM)
answer: Small Industries Development Bank of India (SIDBI)
explanation:
Lucknow-based Small Industries Development Bank of India (SIDBI) recently announced that it will launch a digital platform named 'India SME Services Platform'.
The platform will provide information to the micro, small and medium enterprises (MSMEs) about how to start operations, get finance or credit enhancement and other support services. The platform will also have information on coronavirus-related initiatives in the MSME sector. A dashboard of all government schemes will also be placed in the platform.
